overview: Following the motto Explore Rescue Protect, the Octonauts dive into action whenever there is trouble under the sea.  In these episodes the Octonauts stake out a thief, Pesoâ€™s little brother Pinto comes to visit, and the team use music to rescue a pod of beluga whales.  Includes 7 missions  The Hermit Crabs  The Mixed Up Whales  The Kelp Forest Rescue  The Decorator Crab  The Beluga Whales  The Hungry Pilot Fish  The Vampire Squid  Plus: Find out more about the creatures under the sea with the 7 creature reports
title: Octonauts Sound the Octoalert!
